meanings.definition: Covered in tufts or clumps of hair or feathers.
meanings.sent1: The tufty squirrel had fluffy fur all over.

meanings.sent3: The tufty puppy looked like a little ball of fluff.
meanings.sent4: Her tufty hair resembled a soft cloud floating above her head.
meanings.sent5: The tufty dandelion seeds danced in the wind, spreading their magic.
